summary: Two con artists take a shopgirl under their wing, but complications arise when she begins to fall for a mathematician, disrupting their marrying-for-money scheme.
cast: Henry Fonda|Gene Tierney|Laird Cregar|Shepperd Strudwick|Spring Byington|Frank Orth|Henry Stephenson|Marjorie Gateson|George Lessey|Iris Adrian|Harry Hayden|Gwendolyn Logan|Eric Wilton|William 'Billy' Benedict|Sarah Edwards|Thurston Hall|Clara Blandick|Charles C. title: Anillos en sus dedos
